a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: GDP per head vs. share of services in employment, 2015
The vertical axis shows historical estimates of the employment share in the service sector. The horizontal axis
shows GDP per capita, adjusted for inflation and for differences in living costs between countries.
Data source: Our World In Data based on Herrendorf et al. (2014) and GGDC-10 (2015); Bolt and van Zanden - Maddison Project Database

Note: GDP per capita is expressed in
international-$
at 2011 prices.
